sections.name:
This map can only be operated manually.
You can backup your progress by Exporting the Tracker State
in the top-left corner. You can then import it again.

With the above setting you can trigger whether you got
1:1 mapping (original number of PKMN per place) or
Full mapping (10 PKMN per place)
